property.name: detectMssqlVersion
property.value: select case when @@version like '%Server 2005%' then '2005' when @@version like '%Server 2008%' then '2008' end as version

update message_template set body = 'STUDENT $!termToRepresentEarlyAlert SYSTEM MESSAGE
Student Name$earlyAlert.person.firstName $earlyAlert.person.lastName Student ID$!earlyAlert.person.schoolId Student Phone$!earlyAlert.person.homePhone Student Email$earlyAlert.person.primaryEmailAddress Address#if( $earlyAlert.person.addressLine1 )$earlyAlert.person.addressLine1, #end#if( $earlyAlert.person.addressLine2 )$earlyAlert.person.addressLine2, #end#if( $earlyAlert.person.city )$earlyAlert.person.city, #end#if( $earlyAlert.person.state )$earlyAlert.person.state, #end$!earlyAlert.person.zipCode In the class$!earlyAlert.courseName Instructor$earlyAlert.createdBy.firstName $earlyAlert.createdBy.lastName Campus$earlyAlert.campus.name Instructor Office Location$!earlyAlert.createdBy.staffDetails.officeLocation Instructor Email$earlyAlert.createdBy.primaryEmailAddress Instructor Phone$!earlyAlert.createdBy.workPhone Advisor$earlyAlert.person.coach.firstName $earlyAlert.person.coach.lastName

#foreach( $earlyAlertReason in $earlyAlert.earlyAlertReasonIds ) $earlyAlertReason.name #end

#foreach( $earlyAlertSuggestion in $earlyAlert.earlyAlertSuggestionIds ) $earlyAlertSuggestion.name #end
#if( $earlyAlert.comment )
******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************
$earlyAlert.comment
******************* INSTRUCTOR COMMENTS *******************
#end To access additional information or respond to this alert, log-in#if( $applicationTitle ) to $applicationTitle#end#if( $termForEarlyAlert ) and view the student's $termForEarlyAlert Tool#end. $!linkToSSP
Email generated by $!applicationTitle $!termForEarlyAlert ' where id = 'b528c1ac-6104-435b-ae62-08eb4f7ee2f9';
